author: Ryan Hart
comment: [Edit: They apparently did a soft update without actually updating the app itself, which enables opening a song on Google Play Music. I changed my rating from a 1 star to a 5 star based on this alone.] I hate the new interface. It highly prioritizes people use use Spotify. I use Google Play music. If I wanted to add an identified song on Google Play Music, I'd need to back out and go to my song history on Shazam and then add the song to Google Play Music from there. Needless to say, I will be looking for a different music identification app now.

author: Robert Sebolt
comment: Love the new updated interface with the ability to swipe to see top songs, video and a related play list! Awesome. Need to have a paid version where we can listen to the while song under related playlists!

author: Val
comment: I no longer can buy my identified song on Amazon or Google Play store through the app making it almost worthless .... Searching for another music ID app ....

author: Edward Campton
comment: This latest update (Feb '18) really sets it apart providing real time lyrics and all of the track info. and videos. I use it directly with Spotify so it is really easy to create a Shazam playlist. As usual it identifies v quickly.

author: Benjamin Kennedy
comment: Another UPDATE Feb 2018.  * This app has become a bad joke now.  Asking a dead slug would yield better results.  Jan 2018: *** I've been using this for years.  Nice and quick but struggles with rarer house and techno records.  It's still a solid app and I like the auto-Shazam feature that'll automatically tag the songs from your evening.  :)    UPDATE Dec 2017 It's appallingly bad at identifying remixes.  There should be an option to tell the app it's tagged the wrong song and to try a longer snippet.  With all music now being digital with its own unique signature there's simply no excuse for Shazam to be this bad at remixes.  I'm still glad to have it but it's nearly useless at catching things I listen to a lot of the time.

author: spencer campbell
comment: Now that Apple bought Shazam, it no longer supports Amazon Music. Imagine that... Uninstalling

author: Tye Krieger
comment: Since the last update songs shazamed don't link to my Spotify account.  The songs I shazam are on  the Spotify catalogue.  Fix it!

author: A Google User
comment: If you have a older version which works for you DONT UPDATE the new layout is completely illogical and offers no valid reason to update.   Once you are finished looking for your music, which all get deleted eventually, why hide the delete into a 2 click menu instead of a 1 click icon on the same page? The GUI is now flawed, please fix. This is unable to identify music which has been around for 50 yrs, eg Jimmy Rodgers - Today, SoundHound was able to essily identify it so you really need both apps. Update Feb 18. Now the delete is renamed and moved again, as if to make deleting your Shazams even more painful. Just bring back the delete icon ffs?!?!

author: I C
comment: And STILL GPM takes me to upgrade to family plan. Useless.

author: Luke Katarski
comment: Hardly identifies any song playing now. Other similar apps seem to work better.

author: Angela Biscoe
comment: Love the latest update, and it does add the songs into Spotify but you can specify which playlist yourself. Keep up the good work guys. Thanks
Why does this need Google Play Service's Calendar and Body sensors?

author: Diane Trout
comment: Love this app but it would be even better if you could get rid of dupicates

author: Hugo Mathee
comment: Google Play Music link on shazamed track only takes you to Play music Family subscription page

author: Adam Kee Ooi Yuen
comment: The new looks is definitely something great most of the Shazamers like me wants. It's gorgeous!

author: Dean Li
comment: Omg! New version amazing!!!!!!!!!!

author: Alessandro Sartori
comment: I love the new design, and the app is overall much faster. Keep it up 👍

author: Mark B
comment: Good start Apple but why two steps to get the full lyrics going?

author: Will Taylor
comment: Love the new interface everything looks way more modern now

author: MA ANDATE TUTTI A FARE IN CULO VAI IN CULO
comment: Congratulation for new interface. More simple and elegant. Great!

author: Mustapha Djebiri
comment: Why ....

author: Narendra Bondade
comment: Useful app for knowing the name of the songs & lyrics!

author: AzorAhai Archangel
comment: Love this app. Best in Class!

author: Lucas
comment: Useful and works well for me

author: Hasan Wajahat
comment: Great App!

author: NORPA
comment: Shazam goes to an low cost app after update. I had more than 300 tags and when  updated to the newest version after logged i  with the same facebook login details i lost all shazam tags. Shows 0 tags.... i lost forever. I cant backup. Myshazam on webpage got 0 tags with my facebook account. Not fair from shazam..... dont pay for Encore!

author: midnight 42
comment: What the f**k I've paid for no adds so how dare you throw adds on me when I'm reading lyrics! GIVE ME MY MONEY BACK YOU GREEDY B*****D'S!

author: Amanda McWilliams
comment: It isn't always able to identify a song, regardless of data, number of times song is "shazamed", etc. Is also slow and the auto shazam isnt reliable. I am a long time user, and it's good, but as time passes it's like it gets more and more inefficient.

author: Lamina Anju
comment: App works well and recognizes songs fast. Sadly only through speakers and not directly from your phones soundcard like the older version of Shazam once was able to. Would be great if recognizing sounds directly would come back again. Like when you are listening radio with headphones and want the name of the song playing without having to put off the headphones.

author: Ana Starinskaja
comment: I paid for Pro version and I lost all my shahzams that were being synchronised to Facebook account when I lost access to it. Auto shahzam finds only 15 ahahzams during the whole day radio played. This is abnormal. It does nothing after 3 hours except draining the battery. Requires manual shahzamming to recognize all the songs. So stupid. Just another stupid app that keeps me on the phone instead of setting me free. Thank you, Apple for making my life miserable and my phone useless! But I'll never buy an iPhone anyway!!!

author: Gergő Kovács
comment: I paid for it but I can't use it. When I try to open it it says "No apps can perform this action". The free version with ads works just fine. Please fix this!

author: DAVID GARCIA
comment: Will application is nice and gone be missing as apple set to buy this company out next week . that likely pull andriod support away too. People been saying futures are gone from the app.

author: DECO1234111
comment: Where is google integration.  Apple has made a poor decision cancelling this feature and being self centred as always. Hence why they will lose me like everything else as a customer

author: Adrin Nosrati
comment: I paid for no adds still when I go to lyrics there's adds. Please remove this as sson as possible.  What is this? You are exactly stealing from people

author: A Google User
comment: The recent announcement that Apple has bought Shazam means another good thing comes to an end. Apple will just screw with it and ruin it.

author: A Google User
comment: Worth the price. If you have trouble with the ads showing up try login out and then login back in. Fixed it for me.

author: Simon Kingston
comment: Very disappointed with recent updates, changing the source for lyrics.  Firstly, using musixmatch is a terrible idea. Their lyrics usually have some sort of mistakes in them, they are spaced so far apart that constant scrolling is required to keep up, and they have breaks in all the wrong places not in line with where a verse actually starts or finishes.  And the worst thing is, I have paid for the Encore version of Shazam so that there's no ads, but then I go to the lyrics, and musixmatch has ADS.  Dump them Shazam, they're terrible.

author: Faiber Rodriguez
comment: Would give 5 stars if keep record on the cloud about my Shazam, just got a new phone and lost my history. Also I have the encore version and show ads from google

author: Sean G
comment: I bought this and now I get the error 'no apps can perform this action". The one with the adds works but I paid for this one to avoid the adds.

author: Tim Spencer
comment: It was great, and still is, but it used to be better. I don't like the ads in a paid app nor do I like the flat interface. I shouldn't have to swipe, hunt, and hope that I find what I want.
